marklogic.body: one foot there and one foot here will result in a hard hit to the b a l l s !!!...proved their mettle huh?....yeah....that is why they are languishing out of the top four....they are lucky to be in CL and FA cup still!!....way way lucky....and u will not find a saneÂ guy who will bet on them on winning either!!....all they have proved is that they want to attain success Off of money.....that player power is more tan manager power.....thatÂ the club is in dissarray because of players.....and keep their concentration?.....spuds were out of form.....on an all time low when they visited stamford bridge.....and even then they managed to dominate the game and go back withÂ 1 pt instead of 3 due toÂ bad luck.....chelsea have never deserved the UCL Spot.....newcastle indeed deserve it more
